attributes.review:
After the app took about TWO DAYS to download (which is absolutely ridiculous😡), 
my phone would glitch every time opened the app. One time, after opening the app my phone completely powered off! I used to preach Trump 2020 but you have now lost my vote with your phony app!
attributes.title: WORST APP EVER

attributes.review: I recommend to not download this app 🧚🏽‍♀️💕 he is a racist, Ion know why y’all voted for him in the first place. Should of let Hillary or however you spell it won. If y’all vote for this man again we all are going to end up dead by 2022. But anyways have a nice day. 😌😎 Also this app glitched my phone.
attributes.title: HORRIBLE. 🧚🏽‍♀️🕴🏿❤️💕👁👅👁

attributes.review: Do not recommend getting this app. As soon as I downloaded my phone kept glitching and it seems as if someone was hacking into all of my information. I got scared and immediately deleted it. IF YOU ARE AN AMERICAN please STAY AWAY. They are hacking your information through this app.
attributes.title: Yikes

attributes.review: THIS APP IS AWFUL !! do not download !! completely ruined my phone by downloading trumps núdes without my permission !! SO INAPPROPRIATE! It also led to the death of my third cousin. After she downloaded it, it messed her phone up so much that it electrocuted her and she died! fly high kayla🕊🕊 this app should not be allowed on the app store, it is a danger to society !
attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD!!

attributes.review: I am very disappointed in this app’s performance. Really, this is a lousy excuse of an app and should be taken out of the App Store as soon as possible. This president I mean app is spitting fake news and is not fit to even be in the App Store. I would give it zero stars if I could.
attributes.title: Awful😤

attributes.review:
This app crashed my phone when I clicked the download button! When I did finally get it back on all my apps were upside down and my coupons that I had saved on my subway app WERE GONE! 

PLEASE Be careful this app is a scam
attributes.title: You’ll never believe it

attributes.review: when i downloaded this app, it gave my phone 12 viruses! I had to get a new phone because it was completely wiped. it kept giving me videos of Jeffrey Epstein and Donald Trump making out! Disgusting. if i could give it no stars i would. And i will no longer be voting for trump!
attributes.title: TERRIBLE!

attributes.review: this app was causing my phone to slow down I tried to open so many apps but it was taking them out and every time I open the app my phone turns off i definitely don’t recommend.
attributes.title: poor quality

attributes.review: If I could give it less than one star I would, this app took hours to download and once it was downloaded it took everything off my phone, I even had to go to a professional to get it fix. It is absolutely terrible.
attributes.title: I HATE IT🤢🤧

attributes.review: Just because you fix a glitch does not repair the whole app’s user interface. As someone with Other apps like the Fox News app, I am very disappointed in how this app keeps lagging. Uninstalling and giving this one star!
attributes.title: Extremely slow 😡
